name: Priceshredder
description: Priceshredder helps people who are already insured by the company to change the conditions of insurance at a more affordable price with the help of insurance brokers of another company.
goals: Add notification and modal popups support
Create a design for the Buyer profile and Seller/Buyer Dashboard
Redesign the platform and implement Blog functionality
solutions: We provided support for multi-user accounts and implemented WebSockets for this goal
outcome: The useful and popular smartphone-based platform that helps insurance buyers receive and manage bids from major insurance companies. As a result, PriceShredder allows an easier, faster, and more efficient way to shop for insurance.
